meanings.sent1: After the mistake, they reinterviewed the candidate to ask more questions.
meanings.sent2: The detective reinterviewed the witness to gather more information.
meanings.sent3: The job applicant was reinterviewed so many times, they lost count!
meanings.sent4: The journalist reinterviewed the celebrity, hoping for a different story.
meanings.sent5: The scientist reinterviewed the study participants for accuracy.

meanings.sent1: The reinterviewed candidate felt nervous about the second round of questions.
meanings.sent2: The reinterviewed job applicant prepared even more for the follow-up meeting.
meanings.sent3: The reinterviewed employee joked that they were becoming a pro at interviews.
meanings.sent4: The reinterviewed student felt relieved to have another chance to impress.
meanings.sent5: The reinterviewed actor practiced their lines diligently for the callback.
